action.msg: So, what crazy shit are we dealing with today?
Psychotic nun? Talking fruit? Horny shapeshifter? Dealing with the raccoons?
This one's new. Someone in town gave me a letter, and told them to go to this spot at this time.
So, you're just gonna do it?
Might as well. Not like I had much to do.
Call me crazy, but I feel like this handwritings familiar... letter smells nice, too.
And anyways, I kinda have to, y'know.
That rule where you HAVE to accept all challenges is pretty lame.
Yeah, yeah- I know, hell. I'll change it soon, maybe after this.
Let's just go.
There sure are a lot of limos in this parking lot.
Maybe someone famous is in town?
Oddly enough, Fever Town IS a hot vacation spot...
Probably cause rules are so scarce here. Anyone can come into Fever Town, do shady shit, then probably leave without any repercussions.
Thanks for making me feel better about the way I run things.
Sup, Fever.
Huh, wait, YOU?...
Oh? Who's this?
So you're Tea. I've heard a bit about the both of you together already. Taking the world by storm, huh?
I'm Hunni, but there's no need to tell you my name.
Cause after I beat you, the rest of the world will soon know.
Cherry here WOULD have just opened a portal to your location, but I forgot about the demon rule.
Uh, what's the demon rule?
It's that demons can't summon a portal to another demons location. Cause y'know, it'd be rude for someone trying to take anothers soul to butt in.
Oh, so Hunni's also a demon?
Me? That's cute. Let me introduce Cherry.
Hey Fever. What's up?
Oh, y'know. Just... getting by.
Wait, but she has a halo...
I'm half angel, too.
WHAT- HOW DOES THAT MAKE ANY SENSE?
About as much sense as a demon dating a bunny.
Uh- okay, got me there.
Anyways, it's been a while huh Fever? Doesn't seem like you got much taller from the last time we met, though.
Not fair to say that when you're on top of that limo.
Then why dont you two hurry up and get on already? Unless you're already intimidated by our aura?
Pfft, intimidated? As if! Tea and I are a power couple, there's nothing that could-
WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT?
Huh? What are what?
Those... large, fluffy, white creatures. They look like...
You mean the bunnies?
Aren't they beautiful? Every one of them answer to me, and me only.
I guess you can say I'm their leader in a way.
That's cute. Y'know, once you get past the fact they're freakishly large. Reminds me of...
Why do ya'll have my ancestors enslaved???
Yeah, no, I'm out.
Tea? Hey, wait- where are you going???
I'm gonna be sick. I'll see you back home, Fever.
Power couple, huh?
You know it!
I wasn't expecting this either... but hey, this just tips the scales in my favor. Not like you had any chance against me anyway.
I don't need someone backing me up to win! Tea's just a bonus!
A very, very hot bonus.
I can respect that mentality. I'm also used to having the most lovely individual in the world cheering me on~.
Aww! Hunni-
This cute bunny! And this one, and this one! Come to me! You're all gonna dance so well!
Whatever! You can have them cheer you on all you want, it won't make a difference either way!
You sure are confident. Reminds me of an earlier time, huh?
GET THE FUCK OFF MY CAR OR I WILL PISS MYSELF.
Huh? Who was-
The driver, obviously. Don't mind her.
So, this isn't your limo?...
Well it's my limo now.
I'm going to have an anuerysm.
